column3: love!  There really isn't anything I've had here that I didn't love.  I've personally had the crunchy chicken
column6: and Asian chicken salad.  The salads are huge!  My friends have enjoyed the falafel and banh mi too.  Even my husband
column8: really liked his truffled egg salad with posole on the side.  You can't go wrong with the homemade chips and any soup.
